snippet: Inmates at a prison in western Venezuela have released about 1,200 relatives of prisoners whom they had been holding as hostages since Sunday, a senior prison official said Thursday.
abstract: Inmates at a jail in western Venezuela release about 1,200 relatives of prisoners whom they had been holding as hostages; they had seized them after trying to negotiate human rights protections with the prison authorities.
lead_paragraph: Inmates at a prison in western Venezuela have released about 1,200 relatives of prisoners whom they had been holding as hostages since Sunday, a senior prison official said Thursday.
